title: Queued Ticking
description: Triggers the specified event, either once, or at a regular interval equal to a number of ticks randomly chosen from the interval_range provided.

looping.title: Looping
looping.description: Does the event loop? If false, the event will only be triggered once, after a delay equal to a number of ticks randomly chosen from the interval_range. If true, the event will loop, and each interval between events will be equal to a number of ticks randomly chosen from the interval_range.

interval_range.title: Range
interval_range.description: The range between which the component will trigger his event.

on_tick.title: Event: On Tick
on_tick.description: The event that will be triggered once or on an interval.
